sen.j: 御内仏（おないぶつ）とは、仏壇のことであり、またその中に迎えた本尊を言う。
sen.e: Onaibutsu is a Buddhist altar or a principal image enshrined in it.

sen.e: The term originated from Jodo Shinshu (the Pure True Land school of Buddhism) but is now commonly used by any other school.
